forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
